alert.note: Alert for Weld (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 14 at 3:22PM MDT until August 14 at 3:45PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: The National Weather Service in Denver Colorado has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Weld County in northeastern Colorado... * Until 345 PM MDT. * At 322 PM MDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 4 miles south of Rockport, or 21 miles south of Cheyenne, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. * Locations impacted include... Rockport. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
